title: Date and tamarind chutney

preparations.content: Place all ingredients into mixing bowl, except chaat masala, and cook <b>45 min/100°C/speed 2<b>.

Add chaat masala and mix <b>30 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer chutney into sterilised jars with lids and seal immediately. Turn upside down for 10 minutes, then turn upright and let cool for a minimum of 8 hours. Store in your pantry until ready to serve (see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: To make your own tamarind paste and chaat masala, please refer to the recipes on this recipe chip.
Once opened, store chutney in the refrigerator for up to 6 months.
